name: Crazy Ball (itch) (Rehcub)
description:
Summery

This game is only playable locally , NO ONLINE MODE. 

In Crazy Ball you play with up to 4 players and try to get the ball to the goal.

______________________________________________________________

Controls

______________________________________________________________

Gameplay

At the beginning of your turn you choose an object or receive one random. 

Than you have to place this object at any location, after that the round starts and the ball starts moving.  

While the ball is moving you can push it to up your chance of winning or to prevent the opponents win. You can also collect Powerups, which for example slows time, reverse gravity, or changes the balls shape. 

Now when the ball hits the goal the player who last placed an object wins.
